title: Print from WebView
body: Give us a Print() function for the UWP WebView control. Using WebViewBrush isn't an acceptable response.

comments.body: This is needed for enterprise applications.  Sad that this has not been implemented or even considered.
I concur. In classic windows applications, webbrowser(internet explorer) could do it.

I concur.  I have a lot of problems trying to print any amount of webpages since the webpage has to be 'reloaded' within the print methods (and hopefully rendered in time) just to get to a point where a page can be snapshotted with WebViewBrush.  When I get a blank page (since it didn't render in time) the feedback is usually, "well Edge can print". Ug!
